structure.unit: AGRICULTURAL SEEDS, FEEDING STUFFS, AND FERTILIZERS

law.text: All moneys received from the registration fees and fines collected by the department hereunder shall be deposited to a revolving fund in the State Treasury to be used for the administration and enforcement of KRS 250.650 to 250.720.
law.history: Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 152, sec. 133. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 160, sec. 8.
